configFirebaseDescription: Function that set a firebase project instance.
firebaseApiKey: API key: Api access key. Example: 'AIzaS...FTZ8'
firebaseAuthDomain: Auth domain: Firebase auth domain. Example: 'my-project-11.firebaseapp.com'
firebaseDatabaseURL: Database URL: Firebase database URL. Example: 'my-project-11.firebaseapp.com'
firebaseProjectId: Project id: Firebase project id. Example: 'my-project-11'
firebaseStorageBucket: Storage Bucket: Firebase Storage bucket (storageBucket). Example: 'my-project-11.appspot.com'
messagingSenderId: Messaging sender id: Firebase messaging sender id (messagingSenderId). Example:'123456789012'
firebaseProvider: Provider auth: Firebase auth provider, if it's public, leave empty.
firebaseGetDatabaseDescription: Function that get a database from firebase
firebaseOptionalAppName: App name: Optional App name (empty means default app).
firebaseAddDataDescription: Function that Overwrite an data object into path of firebase database. This function clean the original content from path
firebaseDatabase: Firebase database: return of Get database function
firebaseData: Data: Content data to add on path
firebaseAddOnEventDescription: Function that evaluate the statements when receive some change from realtime database on specified path
firebaseAddOnnceEventDescription: Function that evaluate the statments once. Example: read initialized variables
firebaseUpdateDataDescription: Function that update data from a specified path on database
firebasePushDataDescription: Function that append an node on specified path.
